node.detail_zh: 黃大仙區郵政局將會暫停服務，其餘全線郵政局則會於星期一、三、五維持正常開門時間，但會提早於下午 4 時關閉；流動郵政局會暫停服務。
node.detail_en: Post offices situated in Wong Tai Sin District will be suspended from service. All other post offices will maintain their normal opening hours on Monday, Wednesday and Friday, but their closing hours will be advanced to 4pm. Mobile post offices will be suspended from service.

node.detail_zh: 只提供有限度務服
node.detail_en: Only limited services will be provided

node.detail_zh: 除24小時熱線外，所有服務只提供有限度服務
node.detail_en: Except hotline service, all services will only provide limited services

node.detail_zh: 只提供緊急及必須的公共服務
node.detail_en: Only emergency and essential services are available

node.detail_zh: 只提供緊急和必須公共服務
node.detail_en: Only emergency services and essential public services will be provided

node.detail_zh: 除中央詢問處（有關離港人士清繳稅項的查詢）、中央電話查詢處、商業登記署及印花稅署外，所有服務暫停
node.detail_en:
All services suspended except Central Enquiry Counter
(enquiries relating to tax clearance for taxpayers leaving Hong Kong), Central Telephone Enquiry, Business Registration Office and Stamp Office

node.detail_zh: 只提供緊急和必須的公共服務
node.detail_en: Only emergency services and essential public services will be provided

node.detail_zh: 詢問處櫃位只於星期三及星期五 08:30-14:00 開放
node.detail_en: Enquiry counters only open on Wednesday and Friday (8.30am to 2pm)

node.detail_zh: 只提供公共道路的必要及緊急維修服務
node.detail_en: Only essential and emergency public road repair services will be provided

node.detail_zh: 牌照服務櫃位及海岸公園辦事處只提供有限度服務
node.detail_en: Only limited services for licensing services counters and the Marine Parks Office will be provided

node.detail_zh: 只維持緊急及必須的公共服務
node.detail_en: Only maintain emergency and essential public services

node.detail_zh: 只提供有限度服務
node.detail_en: Only limited services will be provided

node.detail_zh: 只提供有限度服務
node.detail_en: Only limited services will be provided

node.detail_zh: 只提供有限度的基本公共服務
node.detail_en: Only limited basic public services are available.

node.detail_zh: 只以投遞箱接收文件
node.detail_en: Documents will only be received by drop-in boxes

node.detail_zh: 1823 現時集中處理與疫情及環境衞生相關的來電，並只能就其他來電提供有限度服務，巿民輪候和服務處理的時間可能會延長。經電郵、手機應用程式、電子表格及短訊等途徑提交的查詢及投訴將暫停處理。
node.detail_en: 1823 is now focusing on handling calls related to the epidemic and environmental hygiene. Limited services will be provided to handle other calls. The waiting/‌processing time may be lengthened. Complaints from email, mobile App, web form and SMS will not be handled.

node.detail_zh: 只提供有限度服務
node.detail_en: Only limited services will be provided

node.name_zh: 所有政府非緊急及非必要服務
node.detail_zh: 大部分櫃枱服務由 7 月 20 日至 7 月 26 日暫停。
node.detail_en: Most said services will be suspended from July 20 to July 26.

node.detail_zh: 7 月 15 日起康文署暫停開放所有康樂和文化場地或設施，同時取消7月份餘下的所有康樂、體育及文化活動
node.detail_en: Starting July 15, LCSD's venues temporary close for 1 week.

node.detail_zh: 7月 15 日起暫停接見未經預約的市民，所有與當值或個案主任的面見會議須先預約安排。
node.detail_en: Starting July 15, all reservation will be cancelled.

node.detail_zh: 停飛所有國際航班至少至2021 年3月底
node.detail_en: Flights between Hong Kong and Australia suspend

node.detail_zh: 全部食肆堂食只限每檯 4 人，並需於進餐前量度體溫，進餐前後需帶上口罩。
node.detail_en: All restaurants can serve a maximum of 4 persons per table. Body temperature checking and masks wearing before and after meal are required.

node.detail_zh: 縱橫遊將取消 7月15日至7月28日期間出發的所有「香港一天遊」旅行團
node.detail_en: All tour will be cancelled from July 15 till July 28

node.name_zh: 所有卡拉OK、浴室、派對房間、夜店和夜總會
node.name_en: All karaoke establishments, sauna rooms, party rooms, night clubs
node.detail_zh: 由 7 月 15 日至 7 月 22 日關閉。
node.detail_en: Closed from July 15 to July 22.

node.name_zh: 海洋公園及香港迪士尼樂園
node.detail_zh: 由 7 月 15 日至 7 月 22 日關閉。
node.detail_en: Ocean Park & Disneyland will be closed from July 15 to July 22.

node.detail_zh: 香港書展延期舉行
node.detail_en: Hong Kong Book Fair will be postponed

node.detail_zh: 永久取消香港航線
node.detail_en: Withdraw services between Australia and Hong Kong

node.detail_zh: 2 月 3 日起封閉
node.detail_en: Shut down temporarily starting from Feb 3

node.detail_en: Shut down temporarily from Feb 3
